name: Bedfellows FRENZY
description: Bedfellows FRENZY is a hard as hell, arcade style, smash and loot. Where you rage through various themed levels, demolish buildings, tear though the National Guard, and battle multiple bosses. Crushing and stomping your way up the leader boards, and to ULTIMATE VICTORY!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/Vista/XP Processor: 1.10 GHz Duel Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 and higher, ATI Radeon HD-Series 4650 and higher, Nvidia GeForce 2xx-Series and up DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Standard Audio Controller Additional Notes: May need internet connection for some features
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/Vista/XP Processor: 4.0 GHz Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 and higher, ATI Radeon HD-Series 4650 and higher, Nvidia GeForce 2xx-Series and up DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Standard Audio Controller Additional Notes: May need internet connection for some features
